price: Thus the decree of your Lord was passed against those who disbelieve, that they will be the people of the Fire.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
